segment.source: This section of the Administrator’s Guide for Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) includes information about the various types of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring administration and operating tasks that are typically performed by an administrator.
segment.target: This section of the Administrator’s Guide for Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) includes information about the various types of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring administration and operating tasks that are typically performed by an administrator.

segment.source: This section also includes step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform those tasks.
segment.target: This section also includes step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform those tasks.

segment.source: After you complete all necessary MBAM planning and deploying, you can configure and use MBAM features to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption.
segment.target: After you complete all necessary MBAM planning and deploying, you can configure and use MBAM features to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption.

segment.source: The information in this section describes post-installation day-to-day MBAM feature operations and maintenance tasks.
segment.target: The information in this section describes post-installation day-to-day MBAM feature operations and maintenance tasks.

segment.source: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 1.0
segment.target: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 1.0

segment.source: This section describes how to generate and understand the various MBAM reports to help you monitor the BitLocker usage and compliance activities throughout your enterprise environment.
segment.target: This section describes how to generate and understand the various MBAM reports to help you monitor the BitLocker usage and compliance activities throughout your enterprise environment.

segment.source: This section describes post-installation day-to-day BitLocker encryption management tasks that are accomplished by using MBAM.
segment.target: This section describes post-installation day-to-day BitLocker encryption management tasks that are accomplished by using MBAM.

segment.source: This section describes how to configure MBAM to run in a highly available manner.
segment.target: This section describes how to configure MBAM to run in a highly available manner.

segment.source: It also describes how to use MBAM to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption operations.
segment.target: It also describes how to use MBAM to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption operations.

segment.source: The information in this section describes high availability options for MBAM, as well as how to move MBAM Server features if necessary.
segment.target: The information in this section describes high availability options for MBAM, as well as how to move MBAM Server features if necessary.

segment.source: This section provides an overview of MBAM security considerations and explains many of the data collection and use practices of MBAM.
segment.target: This section provides an overview of MBAM security considerations and explains many of the data collection and use practices of MBAM.

segment.source: This section describes the set of Windows PowerShell cmdlets that are available for administrators to perform various MBAM server tasks from the command prompt rather than from the MBAM administration website.
segment.target: This section describes the set of Windows PowerShell cmdlets that are available for administrators to perform various MBAM server tasks from the command prompt rather than from the MBAM administration website.

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring 1 Administrator's Guide
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring 1 Administrator's Guide
